subject: Re: Medium---well!
author: Jill
full_text:
I agree, I do think you attract entities more because they know you are "open for business."  However, along with some people I didn't know, I also had communication from those I did, and who had clearly been with me all along:  my dad, etc.  Before using the ghost box, my mom and I would experience phenomena around the house such as the tv being turned on, the gps suddenly turning on by itself and talking, a bottle of my dad's booze being knocked over and broken.  After the ghost box, all that stopped, and instead, every morning after a ghost box session, I would get an image like a still photograph put into my mind the very first thing upon waking up.  My grandparents, my dad, my uncle, even my distant ancestors I'd never met, all of them were shown to me like they were at the age they were the most vibrant (before I was born), and always in a pose wearing clothes that didn't match any photos.  During the dry spells when I haven't used the box for months, no photos in my head.  

So I would definitely say somehow the box can enhance psychic ability.  I just would like to know HOW!
